Metadata.Title: Place Logout Links on All Pages That Require Authentication
Metadata.DirectLink: Place Logout Links on All Pages That Require Authentication

Content.Data:
==What to Do==
Place a logout link on each page that requires authentication.
==Why==
Placing a logout link on every page that requires authentication helps the user end the session when he is done with the site. Ending the session helps prevent hijacking.
==How==
To place a logout link on each page that uses authentication:
# **Identify all pages that use authentication.** Make a list of all pages on your site that use authentication. # **Add logout links.** Add a logout link to each page that uses authentication.
